Name: Pizza Tropicale
AttributesDescription: Increases Healing Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription:
A non-traditional dish from Rinascita, topped with gemberry jam, cheese, and crownapple. When it comes out of the oven, it elicits gasps and cries.
1. NEVER mention Pizza Tropicale to a Ragunnesi.
2. NEVER mention crownapple to a Ragunnesi.
3. NEVER mention apple or crown...
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Healing Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
